title: [Critical] Mordekaiser interaction with Revitalize Rune added two extra 0's when on low health
body:
With the new patch, the interaction with Revitalize on how health and Morde's passive has become completely busted. Below 40% HP, the shielding increase becomes over 1000% rather than 10%. This is not just reflected in the tooltip, _this is a functional change,_  so hitting a single champion with your E below 40% HP will immediately refill your entire shield bar. Mordekaiser needs to be disabled ASAP.
